text: @EnvAgencyMids I'm fed up of you saying there's unlikely to be 'long-term' health impacts. What about our stress & anxiety levels? Sleep deprivation? Our inability to go outside for exercise? I've cried every day this week because the odour has worsened. We've had no respite from this hell.
RT @tayz_BETH: @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg come to Clayton ! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Come Taste This !!@ @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https:‚Ä¶
